metadata.Title: CVE-2015-5143 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The session backends in Django before 1.4.21, 1.5.x through 1.6.x, 1.7.x before 1.7.9, and 1.8.x before 1.8.3 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (session store consumption) via multiple requests with unique session keys.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-5143` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-django - 1.6.1-2ubuntu0.9
No subscription required

advisory.DiscoveredBy: Eric Peterson and Lin Hua Cheng

criterions.comment: python-django package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.6.1-2ubuntu0.9').
